app.title: AI Image Editor
app.author: Created by
lang.switcher.label: Language
sidebar.button.clearDraft.title: Clear all images and start a new session
sidebar.confirm.clearDraft: Are you sure you want to clear everything and start over? This action cannot be undone.
sidebar.referenceImagesHint: Only the most recently added reference image is supported
sidebar.prompt.placeholder.editWithRef: e.g., 'Change the person's clothes to match the reference...'
sidebar.prompt.placeholder.editEmpty: Please import and select an image first...
sidebar.prompt.placeholder.generate: e.g., 'A cat wearing an astronaut helmet...'
sidebar.prompt.placeholder.video: e.g., 'Close-up of a cat typing on a keyboard, cinematic...'
sidebar.prompt.placeholder.videoWithRef: Describe how to generate a video based on the reference/selected image...
sidebar.button.reset.title: Reset all edits for this image
workspace.empty.edit: Please import an image to start editing
workspace.empty.generate: Enter a prompt in the sidebar to generate your first image
workspace.empty.video: Enter a prompt and optionally select a reference image to generate a video
history.title: Edit History
history.delete.title: Delete version {version} and subsequent versions
filmstrip.reference.add.title: Set as reference image
filmstrip.reference.remove.title: Unset as reference image
filmstrip.delete.title: Delete image
filmstrip.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image and all its history? This action cannot be undone.
tunePanel.title: Classic Editing Tools
error.imageRequired: Please select an image to edit.
error.editFailed: The AI failed to return an edited image.
error.generateFailed: The AI failed to generate an image.
error.atLeastOneImageRequired: At least one image is required for editing.
error.fourImagesRequired: Combining a 2x2 grid requires exactly 4 images to be selected.
video.progress.generating: Generating animation frames... This may take a few minutes.
error.video.generationFailed: AI video generation failed. Please check the console for details.
error.video.noLink: Video generation complete, but no download link was found.
